control.visible: [Player.ShowInfo | Window.IsActive(VideoOSD) | Window.IsVisible(DialogSeekbar.xml)] + ![Window.IsVisible(OSDVideoSettings) | Window.IsVisible(OSDAudioSettings) | Window.IsVisible(OSDSubtitleSettings) | Window.IsVisible(VideoBookmarks) | Window.IsVisible(PVROSDChannels) | Window.IsVisible(PVRChannelGuide) | Window.IsVisible(SliderDialog)]

![Window.IsVisible(SliderDialog) | Window.IsVisible(OSDVideoSettings) | Window.IsVisible(OSDAudioSettings) | Window.IsVisible(OSDSubtitleSettings) | Window.IsVisible(VideoBookmarks) | Window.IsVisible(PVROSDChannels) | Window.IsVisible(PVRChannelGuide)]

![Window.IsVisible(SliderDialog) | Window.IsVisible(OSDVideoSettings) | Window.IsVisible(OSDAudioSettings) | Window.IsVisible(OSDSubtitleSettings) | Window.IsVisible(VideoBookmarks) | Window.IsVisible(PVROSDChannels) | Window.IsVisible(PVRChannelGuide)]

control.label: Verbleibende Zeit: $INFO[VideoPlayer.TimeRemaining] Endet um: $INFO[Player.FinishTime]Uhr Als nächstes läuft: $INFO[VideoPlayer.NextTitle]

control.control:
480r900r 890 VideoPlayer.Content(LiveTV)
!Skin.HasSetting(Shadow) -84 2 86 33 flags/resolution/HDR.png keep String.Contains(Player.FilenameAndPath,HDR)
-86 0 86 33 flags/resolution/HDR.png keep String.Contains(Player.FilenameAndPath,HDR)
!Skin.HasSetting(Shadow) 7 2 86 33 $INFO[VideoPlayer.VideoAspect,flags/aspectratio/,.png] keep
5 0 86 33 $INFO[VideoPlayer.VideoAspect,flags/aspectratio/,.png] keep
!Skin.HasSetting(Shadow) 98 2 86 33 $INFO[VideoPlayer.VideoResolution,flags/resolution/,.png] keep
96 0 86 33 $INFO[VideoPlayer.VideoResolution,flags/resolution/,.png] keep
!Skin.HasSetting(Shadow) 189 2 86 33 $INFO[VideoPlayer.VideoCodec,flags/videocodec/,.png] keep
187 0 86 33 $INFO[VideoPlayer.VideoCodec,flags/videocodec/,.png] keep
!Skin.HasSetting(Shadow) 280 2 86 33 $INFO[VideoPlayer.AudioCodec,flags/audio/,.png] keep !String.Contains(Player.FilenameAndPath,.atmos)
278 0 86 33 $INFO[VideoPlayer.AudioCodec,flags/audio/,.png] keep !String.Contains(Player.FilenameAndPath,.atmos)
!Skin.HasSetting(Shadow) 280 2 86 33 flags/audio/atmos.png keep [String.Contains(VideoPlayer.AudioCodec,eac3) | String.Contains(VideoPlayer.AudioCodec,truehd)] + String.Contains(Player.FilenameAndPath,.atmos)
278 0 86 33 flags/audio/atmos.png keep [String.Contains(VideoPlayer.AudioCodec,eac3) | String.Contains(VideoPlayer.AudioCodec,truehd)] + String.Contains(Player.FilenameAndPath,.atmos)
!Skin.HasSetting(Shadow) 371 2 86 33 $INFO[VideoPlayer.AudioChannels,flags/audio/,.png] keep
369 0 86 33 $INFO[VideoPlayer.AudioChannels,flags/audio/,.png] keep
